description: Returns a DomainDescription object that contains information about the requested domain.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A string that specifies the name of the requested domain.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the domain.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of a domain.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that represents the date and time the domain was created.

nested_items.name: encryptionKey
nested_items.description: The ARN of an Key Management Service (KMS) key associated with a domain.

nested_items.name: repositoryCount
nested_items.description: The number of repositories in the domain.

nested_items.name: assetSizeBytes
nested_items.description: The total size of all assets in the domain.

nested_items.name: s3BucketArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket that is used to store package assets in the domain.
